    ¬†This speaker was absolute GreatüíØ, Even my neighbour vibes with meüëΩ. If you want aesthetic vibes you go for this product, If you want best sound quality just go for Stone 1800.-Battery life: 8hrs continue (50% volume), I never used full volume because It's already good at 50% volume.-Projection lights: 7modes ( All modes are perfect).-Sound quality: Not bad but also Not too good.-weight: Bruhüóø‚ò†Ô∏è (The Name stone, perfectly match for the weight).-Bluetooth connectivity: 5.3 That's great.Overall my Rating: üóø 9.5/10

After discount and coupon , i have purchased at 5700 rs . For this price Boat stone is a good choice .LED and Projector lights are nice and provide a big coverage area .Handle looks very strong and build quality seems to be ok.Sound is very loud and satisfy 60 watts brackets . You will definitely like bass , mid and high level sounds . Thumping bass you can feel if you keep this speaker on wooden platform. There will not be much bass in low volumes but when volume increases then you will start liking .It is very loud with right bass frequencies. There is no distortion on high volumeFew things which would have been better -Boat would have given customise Equaliser to set the best sound as per our ears .Dual bluetooth connectivityButtons are plastic and not easy to use .Better battery to use outdoor.we need to remember the price vs value / featureAs per my suggestion under 6000 rs if you are looking party speaker with 60 watts output additional some lighting features ( Even i don‚Äôt like ).  Boat stone lumos is definitely a better choice compared to many speakers which are usually under 40 watts and price are approximately same.
Woww product at best price with good sound clarity and bass. Lights are just owsam. Got the second one also
Not 60w sound quality,  worst bass. And amazon not providing return, exchange,  replace,  not expected this from Amazon, worst service by Amazon,  don't buy this product.
I like it. Voice quality also good.

Guys, I bought Boat Stone 1400 3 years back for Rs 5500.After 3 years it's not getting properly charged so I went to Goregaon (Mumbai) Service centere. However they said they can't help and denied any repair service. so if u are planning for such a high value product from Boat, Consider such things also.

I recently purchased the boAt Lumos 60W Speaker, expecting a great audio experience, but unfortunately, it didn‚Äôt live up to the hype.üîä Sound Quality (2/5): The audio output is quite underwhelming. The bass lacks depth, and the overall sound clarity is not what you would expect from a 60W speaker. It feels more like an average speaker rather than a premium one.üí° LED Projection Feature (2.5/5): The LED projection is an interesting concept, but it‚Äôs not well-executed. The visuals aren‚Äôt sharp or bright enough to enhance the experience, making it more of a gimmick than a useful
Great product

Absolutely love the speakers. Adequately powerful. Beautiful projection for an enclosed space. And a long battery life so far (lasted 9+ hrs with non-stop music playing). It is little bit larger than I expected though  so not portable when travelling by plane. But perfect for those outdoor picnics and family gatherings!

Looks like boAt stands for Buy Other Amazing TechI bought this as I wanted to try 60W speaker in comparison to my JBL Flip 4 or 5 (bought it couple years ago). The sound is substandard compared to JBL. i rather put same amount in even a lower JBL speaker and I am sure it will still sound better - the crisp and clarity of sound is not there in boAt. Not good bass or balanced sound either.Also, this same speaker came for Rs. 1000 cheaper during amazon prime day which was just two days after I received my speakers but they wouldn't match the price or accept the returns.
Fantastic product at a reasonable price.
